Here are some helpful resources to learn more about Quarto:

- [📄 Quarto cheat sheet](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/quarto.pdf) - A quick reference for essential Quarto commands and syntax.
- [📄️ Quarto official documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/guide/) - The go-to guide for learning Quarto in depth.
- [📄️ PDF formatting with Quarto](https://cameronpatrick.com/post/2023/07/quarto-thesis-formatting/)
- [🗣️️ Build a Quarto website (presentation)](https://posit-conf-2024.github.io/quarto-websites/)
- [🗣️️ Build a Quarto dashboard (presentation)](https://posit-conf-2024.github.io/quarto-dashboards/)
- [📺  Build a Quarto dashboard (tutorial)](href: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R3sNVE8TYeo)
